about_the_game:
Complete challenging puzzles in Puzzle Mode or create awe-inspiring tracks in Sandbox Mode. From humble beginnings to epic constructions, let your creativity run wild. Pick from a wide variety of wooden pieces like turns, ramps, bridges, hinges and more. Customize your courses and enjoy fully simulated physics as each marble rolls down your own unique tracks.

Puzzle Mode

Beat increasingly mind-bending puzzles in Puzzle Mode. Get every marble to reach the finish using a limited amount of blocks. Unlock new types of blocks, ramps and turns with each puzzle you complete. Build your way through vibrant living rooms, cozy bedrooms, and playful children’s rooms, all while pushing the boundaries of your creativity.

Sandbox Mode

Feeling creative? You get a limitless supply of blocks and puzzle pieces, and the ability to spawn dozens of marbles. Create intricate courses and impress your friends or the internet. The only limit is your imagination.
